analyzed: ▁cakkhundriy aṃ sa nidassan anti ādi kathā

original: Hañci “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇan”ti—
attheva suttanto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Nanu passati cakkhuṁ sotaṁ ghānaṁ jivhaṁ kāyanti?
Hañci passati cakkhuṁ sotaṁ ghānaṁ jivhaṁ kāyaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: ▁hañci ▁passati ▁cakkhu ṃ ▁so taṃ ▁ghān aṃ ▁jivh aṃ ▁kāy aṃ ▁tena ▁vata ▁ re ▁vattabbe
